name: Scrap Scavengers
description:
Auto Target System : Nearby Enemies will be aimed at automatically.

Hold Space to fire weapons at current target, use left shift to cycle through targets.

---------FLIGHT CONTROLS----------------

Up and Down arrow: Toggle Engine Level

WASD : Adjust Pitch and Yaw

Left and Right arrow : Roll axis

 i key : Invert Vertical Movement

 p key : Remove "Show Controls" prompt

---------GAME DESCRIPTION------------------

Carefully manuever solo in an interconnected and hostile environment.

You will be alone but your enemies will always be together.

Fallen enemies drop blue Dust. Sometimes they may even drop weapon parts. Killing enemies has a higher weapon drop rate than scavenging. Dust and weapons can be can picked up to make your vessel stronger.

When you are strong enough, destroy both flagships to win.
